original_text: “Call out to me and I will answer you. I will tell you about great things. They are secret things that you do not yet know.”
korean_text: 너는 내게 부르짖으라 내가 네게 응답하겠고 네가 알지 못하는 크고 은밀한 일을 네게 보이리라

sentences.original_text: I will tell you about great things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 큰 일들에 대해 말해주겠다

sentences.original_text: that you do not yet know
